releaseList.title: Seed Updated to utilize angular 2
releaseList.description: This version takes advantage of the latest 2.x version of Angular and its components , this system also updates the services and components on the system

releaseList.title: Seed Updated to Angular 4
releaseList.description: This version takes advantage updates to the latest version of angular 4.x and leverages new http2 and the latest component updates and upgrades

releaseList.title: BC Angular 5 Seed For use with common ui and board 2 libraries
releaseList.description: This is the latest version of the ng seed for use with the updated 2.0 libraries for board 2 and common, This has examples and templates preset to allow you to easily get started building a Angular 5 Project
